stepAnswer: Alex should use absolute references by changing the formula to =$A$1*$B$1
stepBody: Alex wants to ensure that the formula in cell D15, which is $$=A1 B1$$, remains unchanged when copied to cell E15. What should Alex do to maintain the formula's consistency?
choices: Alex should use absolute references by changing the formula to =$A$1*$B$1
Alex should use relative references by changing the formula to $$=A1 B1$$
Alex should use mixed references by changing the formula to =$A1*B$1
Alex should use a named range for the formula
